reference.title: Setting graceful failover
reference.shortdesc: Graceful failover is set through the POST /controller/startGracefulFailover HTTP method and URI.

section.title: Graceful failover REST API
section.p: Performing a POST on the /controller/startGracefulFailover initiates graceful failover. It's progress can be tracked just rebalance. After the data is persisted to disk and replicas are up-to-date, the node is put into the failed over state.
section.note: Be sure to update any scripts that implement failover.
